trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time your Myfox security system receives an alarm (detection, intrusion, silent alert, ...).
This Trigger fires every time your Myfox Security system is armed.

trigger: System is set to night mode
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time your Myfox Security system is set to night mode.
This Trigger fires every time your Myfox Security system is disarmed.
